price: 15 Ceux qui auront cru et accompli de bonnes œuvres seront comblés de joie au Paradis,
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَهُمۡ فِي رَوۡضَةٖ يُحۡبَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fahum fī rawḍatin yuḥ'barūna
